description: Sass is a CSS pre-processor. Sass reduces repetition of CSS and therefore saves time. Our "Show Sass" tool makes it easy to learn Sass, it shows both the code and the result. Run Example Â» At W3Schools you will find complete references of all Sass functions with syntax and examples.
